verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> cause <S%H853><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> her abominations, <S%H8441><s%>

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> Thy birth <S%H4351><s%> and thy nativity <S%H4138><s%> is of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3669><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> was an Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and thy mother <S%H517><s%> a Hittite. <S%H2851><s%>

And as for thy nativity, <S%H4138><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> thou wast born <S%H3205><s%> thy navel <S%H8270><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> cut, <S%H3772><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> wast thou washed <S%H7364><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%> to supple <S%H4935><s%> thee; thou wast not <S%H3808><s%> salted at all, <S%H4414><s%> <S%H4414><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> swaddled at all. <S%H2853><s%> <S%H2853><s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> pitied <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, to do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%> unto thee, to have compassion <S%H2550><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee; but thou wast cast out <S%H7993><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> to the loathing <S%H1604><s%> of thy person, <S%H5315><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou wast born. <S%H3205><s%>

And when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> thee, and saw <S%H7200><s%> thee polluted <S%H947><s%> in thine own blood, <S%H1818><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, <S%H1818><s%> Live; <S%H2421><s%> yea, I said <S%H559><s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, <S%H1818><s%> Live. <S%H2421><s%>

I have caused <S%H5414><s%> thee to multiply <S%H7233><s%> as the bud <S%H6780><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and thou hast increased <S%H7235><s%> and waxen great, <S%H1431><s%> and thou art come <S%H935><s%> to excellent <S%H5716><s%> ornaments: <S%H5716><s%> thy breasts <S%H7699><s%> are fashioned, <S%H3559><s%> and thine hair <S%H8181><s%> is grown, <S%H6779><s%> whereas thou <S%H859><s%> wast naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare. <S%H6181><s%>

Now when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> thee, and looked upon <S%H7200><s%> thee, behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy time <S%H6256><s%> was the time <S%H6256><s%> of love; <S%H1730><s%> and I spread <S%H6566><s%> my skirt <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee, and covered <S%H3680><s%> thy nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> yea, I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thee, and entered <S%H935><s%> into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> and thou becamest <S%H1961><s%> mine.

Then washed <S%H7364><s%> I thee with water; <S%H4325><s%> yea, I throughly washed away <S%H7857><s%> thy blood <S%H1818><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I anointed <S%H5480><s%> thee with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

I clothed <S%H3847><s%> thee also with embroidered work, <S%H7553><s%> and shod <S%H5274><s%> thee with badgers' skin, <S%H8476><s%> and I girded thee about <S%H2280><s%> with fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and I covered <S%H3680><s%> thee with silk. <S%H4897><s%>

I decked <S%H5710><s%> thee also with ornaments, <S%H5716><s%> and I put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy hands, <S%H3027><s%> and a chain <S%H7242><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> thy neck. <S%H1627><s%>

And I put <S%H5414><s%> a jewel <S%H5141><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> thy forehead, <S%H639><s%> and earrings <S%H5694><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> thine ears, <S%H241><s%> and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> upon thine head. <S%H7218><s%>

Thus wast thou decked <S%H5710><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver; <S%H3701><s%> and thy raiment <S%H4403><s%> was of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and silk, <S%H4897><s%> and embroidered work; <S%H7553><s%> thou didst eat <S%H398><s%> fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> and oil: <S%H8081><s%> and thou wast exceeding beautiful, <S%H3302><s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and thou didst prosper <S%H6743><s%> into a kingdom. <S%H4410><s%>

And thy renown <S%H8034><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> for thy beauty: <S%H3308><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was perfect <S%H3632><s%> through my comeliness, <S%H1926><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had put <S%H7760><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

But thou didst trust <S%H982><s%> in thine own beauty, <S%H3308><s%> and playedst the harlot <S%H2181><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of thy renown, <S%H8034><s%> and pouredst out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy fornications <S%H8457><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that passed by; <S%H5674><s%> his it was. <S%H1961><s%>

And of thy garments <S%H4480><s%> <S%H899><s%> thou didst take, <S%H3947><s%> and deckedst <S%H6213><s%> thy high places <S%H1116><s%> with divers colors, <S%H2921><s%> and playedst the harlot <S%H2181><s%> thereupon: <S%H5921><s%> the like things shall not <S%H3808><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall it be <S%H1961><s%> so.

Thou hast also taken <S%H3947><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of my gold <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2091><s%> and of my silver, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3701><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had given <S%H5414><s%> thee, and madest <S%H6213><s%> to thyself images <S%H6754><s%> of men, <S%H2145><s%> and didst commit whoredom <S%H2181><s%> with them,

And tookest <S%H3947><s%> thine embroidered <S%H7553><s%> <S%H853><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and coveredst <S%H3680><s%> them: and thou hast set <S%H5414><s%> mine oil <S%H8081><s%> and mine incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

My meat <S%H3899><s%> also which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> thee, fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and oil, <S%H8081><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> wherewith I fed <S%H398><s%> thee, thou hast even set <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> them for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor: <S%H7381><s%> and thus it was, <S%H1961><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Moreover thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou hast borne <S%H3205><s%> unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> unto them to be devoured. <S%H398><s%> Is this of <S%H4480><s%> thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> a small matter, <S%H4592><s%>
That thou hast slain <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> my children, <S%H1121><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> them to cause them to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire for them?

And in all <S%H3605><s%> thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> and thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth, <S%H5271><s%> when thou wast <S%H1961><s%> naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare, <S%H6181><s%> and wast <S%H1961><s%> polluted <S%H947><s%> in thy blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> (woe, <S%H188><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> unto thee! saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD;) <S%H3069><s%>
That thou hast also built <S%H1129><s%> unto thee an eminent place, <S%H1354><s%> and hast made <S%H6213><s%> thee a high place <S%H7413><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> street. <S%H7339><s%>

Thou hast built <S%H1129><s%> thy high place <S%H7413><s%> at <S%H413><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of the way, <S%H1870><s%> and hast made <S%H853><s%> thy beauty <S%H3308><s%> to be abhorred, <S%H8581><s%> and hast opened <S%H6589><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy feet <S%H7272><s%> to every one <S%H3605><s%> that passed by, <S%H5674><s%> and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy whoredoms. <S%H8457><s%>

Thou hast also committed fornication <S%H2181><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the Egyptians <S%H1121><s%> <S%H4714><s%> thy neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> great <S%H1432><s%> of flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and hast increased <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy whoredoms, <S%H8457><s%> to provoke me to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> therefore I have stretched out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee, and have diminished <S%H1639><s%> thine ordinary <S%H2706><s%> food, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> thee unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> thee, the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> which are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> of thy lewd <S%H2154><s%> way. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%>

Thou hast played the whore <S%H2181><s%> also with <S%H413><s%> the Assyrians, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> because thou wast unsatiable; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1115><s%> <S%H7654><s%> yea, thou hast played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with them, and yet <S%H1571><s%> couldest not <S%H3808><s%> be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

Thou hast moreover multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy fornication <S%H8457><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> unto Chaldea; <S%H3778><s%> and yet <S%H1571><s%> thou wast not <S%H3808><s%> satisfied <S%H7646><s%> herewith. <S%H2063><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> weak <S%H535><s%> is thine heart, <S%H3826><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> seeing thou doest <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, the work <S%H4639><s%> of an imperious <S%H7986><s%> whorish <S%H2181><s%> woman; <S%H802><s%>

In that thou buildest <S%H1129><s%> thine eminent place <S%H1354><s%> in the head <S%H7218><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and makest <S%H6213><s%> thine high place <S%H7413><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> street; <S%H7339><s%> and hast not <S%H3808><s%> been <S%H1961><s%> as a harlot, <S%H2181><s%> in that thou scornest <S%H7046><s%> hire; <S%H868><s%>
But as a wife <S%H802><s%> that committeth adultery, <S%H5003><s%> which taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of her husband! <S%H376><s%>

They give <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> whores: <S%H2181><s%> but thou <S%H859><s%> givest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> thy lovers, <S%H157><s%> and hirest <S%H7809><s%> them, that they may come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee on every side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> for thy whoredom. <S%H8457><s%>

And the contrary <S%H2016><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> in thee from <S%H4480><s%> other women <S%H802><s%> in thy whoredoms, <S%H8457><s%> whereas none <S%H3808><s%> followeth <S%H310><s%> thee to commit whoredoms: <S%H2181><s%> and in that thou givest <S%H5414><s%> a reward, <S%H868><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> reward <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> unto thee, therefore thou art <S%H1961><s%> contrary. <S%H2016><s%>
Wherefore, <S%H3651><s%> O harlot, <S%H2181><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> thy filthiness <S%H5178><s%> was poured out, <S%H8210><s%> and thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> discovered <S%H1540><s%> through thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> thy lovers, <S%H157><s%> and with <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of thy abominations, <S%H8441><s%> and by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy children, <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou didst give <S%H5414><s%> unto them;

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy lovers, <S%H157><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou hast taken pleasure, <S%H6149><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> them that <S%H834><s%> thou hast loved, <S%H157><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> them that <S%H834><s%> thou hast hated; <S%H8130><s%> I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> them round about <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, and will discover <S%H1540><s%> thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, that they may see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

And I will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee, as women that break wedlock <S%H5003><s%> and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged; <S%H4941><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee blood <S%H1818><s%> in fury <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

And I will also give <S%H5414><s%> thee into their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall throw down <S%H2040><s%> thine eminent place, <S%H1354><s%> and shall break down <S%H5422><s%> thy high places: <S%H7413><s%> they shall strip <S%H6584><s%> thee also of thy clothes, <S%H899><s%> and shall take <S%H3947><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels, <S%H3627><s%> and leave <S%H5117><s%> thee naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare. <S%H6181><s%>

They shall also bring up <S%H5927><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, and they shall stone <S%H7275><s%> thee with stones, <S%H68><s%> and thrust thee through <S%H1333><s%> with their swords. <S%H2719><s%>

And they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> thine houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women: <S%H802><s%> and I will cause thee to cease <S%H7673><s%> from playing the harlot, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2181><s%> and thou also <S%H1571><s%> shalt give <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> hire <S%H868><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

So will I make my fury <S%H2534><s%> toward thee to rest, <S%H5117><s%> and my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, and I will be quiet, <S%H8252><s%> and will be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> angry. <S%H3707><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth, <S%H5271><s%> but hast fretted <S%H7264><s%> me in all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things; behold, <S%H1887><s%> therefore I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> will recompense <S%H5414><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> upon thine head, <S%H7218><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that useth proverbs <S%H4911><s%> shall use this proverb <S%H4911><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> As is the mother, <S%H517><s%> so is her daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> art thy mother's <S%H517><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> that loatheth <S%H1602><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and her children; <S%H1121><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> art the sister <S%H269><s%> of thy sisters, <S%H269><s%> which <S%H834><s%> loathed <S%H1602><s%> their husbands <S%H376><s%> and their children: <S%H1121><s%> your mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite, <S%H2851><s%> and your father <S%H1><s%> an Amorite. <S%H567><s%>

And thine elder <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> thy left hand: <S%H8040><s%> and thy younger <S%H6996><s%> sister, <S%H269><s%> that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> at thy right hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3225><s%> is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Yet hast thou not <S%H3808><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> after their ways, <S%H1870><s%> nor done <S%H6213><s%> after their abominations: <S%H8441><s%> but, as if that were a very <S%H6985><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> thing, thou wast corrupted <S%H7843><s%> more than <S%H4480><s%> they in all <S%H3605><s%> thy ways. <S%H1870><s%>

As I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> thy sister <S%H269><s%> hath not <S%H518><s%> done, <S%H6213><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> nor her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> as <S%H834><s%> thou hast done, <S%H6213><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and thy daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of thy sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> pride, <S%H1347><s%> fullness <S%H7653><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and abundance <S%H7962><s%> of idleness <S%H8252><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in her and in her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did she strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>
